

//Series of Srinivasa Ramanujan

INFINITY = 20
//series produces convergence of 50 decimal places at 7 terms, 20 is overkill
series =  SIGMA [0 <= k <= INFINITY] ( (4*k)! * (1103 + 26390*k) / ((k!)^4 * 396 ^ (4*k)) )
// must improve sqrt(2) precision to get above 23 decimal places accuracy in result
piInverted = 2 * sqrt(2) / 9801 * series
RamanujanPiApprox = 1 / piInverted

PRETTYPRINT RamanujanPiApprox 25


READ ComputePiSeries.txt


piFudgedJM = FUDGE piComputedJM

PRETTYPRINT piFudgedJM 50


piFudgedLE = FUDGE piComputedLE

PRETTYPRINT piFudgedLE 50


// LE version analysis
//Most Reduced:  10573358815284988545677821451160010398218210427246:   2 * 3^2 * 7 * 29 * 89 * 349 * 15679 * 21493 * 112877 * 1975201 * 1239929063898028058311
//alternate:  3.14159265358979323{678872222607893076298696964472454} = 70564178622834067107584476776923364740092185153728125264 / 22461275666086986685501161343040635776409298827707028805 =
//			( 2^4 * 29 * 89 * 349 * 1049 * 15679 * 21493 * 50101 * 112877 * 1975201 * 1239929063898028058311 ) / ( 5 * 7^18 * 11 * 13 * 17 * 79^19 )
//error:  9.22E-48 = 13033875352 / 1415060366963480161186573164611560053913785826145542814715 = ( 2^3 * 31 * 1049 * 50101 ) / ( 3^2 * 5 * 7^19 * 11 * 13 * 17 * 79^19 )
//Reduction: 92 / 163


f2 = FUDGE piFudgedLE
PRETTYPRINT f2 50

// =====
// second level fudge
// =====
//Most Reduced:  1239929063898028058262:   2 * 3 * 113 * 173 * 5101 * 1107781 * 1870733

//alternate:  3.14159265358979323   6664571543183 = 
//70564178622834067104795894064256806516691570456203641888 / 22461275666086986685501161343040635776409298827707028805 = 
//( 2^5 * 3 * 29 * 89 * 113 * 173 * 349 * 1049 * 5101 * 15679 * 21493 * 50101 * 112877 * 1107781 * 1870733 * 1975201 ) / ( 5 * 7^18 * 11 * 13 * 17 * 79^19 )

//error:  1.2415068289629169E-19 = 56909851278909351497971728520907824 / 458393380940550748683697170266135424008353037300143445 = 
//( 2^4 * 29 * 89 * 349 * 1049 * 15679 * 21493 * 50101 * 112877 * 1975201 ) / ( 5 * 7^16 * 11 * 13 * 17 * 79^19 )
//Reduction: 50 / 71
